name: slskd
description: slskd is a modern self-hosted Soulseek client daemon with a web UI. It allows searching, downloading, and managing peer-to-peer music transfers on headless servers.
features: Soulseek client: Connects to Soulseek network for peer-to-peer music sharing.
Web interface: Manages searches and downloads through modern browser-based UI.
Search functionality: Searches the network for music files by artist, album, or track.
Download queue: Manages multiple simultaneous downloads with priority controls.
Upload sharing: Shares your music library with other Soulseek users.
User browsing: Browses other users' shared files and libraries.
Wishlist tracking: Monitors searches automatically and downloads when files appear.
Transfer management: Controls upload and download speeds and connection limits.
File organization: Automatically organizes downloaded files by artist and album.
Headless operation: Runs as a daemon on servers without graphical interface.
API access: Integrates with other tools via REST API for automation.
Multi-user support: Allows multiple users to access the same instance with separate settings.
